entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -28.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 06:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
